meanings.definition: A protective egg case of certain insects, especially cockroaches.
meanings.sent1: The oothecae of the cockroach kept the eggs safe from harm.
meanings.sent2: I found an oothecae while exploring the garden.
meanings.sent3: The cockroach built a tiny house out of oothecae for its eggs.
meanings.sent4: The oothecae was like a fortress protecting the precious eggs inside.
meanings.sent5: The oothecae looked like a small, brown purse holding valuable treasures.
